languages.text: "Это утверждение истинно. Кризис мотивирует систему к развитию и усложнению. Чем невыносимее будет испытание, тем более истово будет обращение разума к мудрости Омниссии и тем стабильнее — отклик". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

"This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение истинно. Кризис мотивирует систему к развитию и усложнению. Чем невыносимее будет испытание, тем более истово будет обращение разума к мудрости Омниссии и тем стабильнее — отклик". {n}Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この声明は真実である。危機というものはシステムを成長や精緻化へと駆り立てます。テストが耐えがたければ耐えがたいほど、万機神の智慧に訴えかける精神は熱心になり、応答が安定するのです」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は真実である。危機というものはシステムを成長や精緻化へと駆り立てます。テストが耐えがたければ耐えがたいほど、万機神の智慧に訴えかける精神は熱心になり、応答が安定するのです」{n}雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的，危机会促使整个系统朝着增长、细化的方向发展。越是难以忍受的考验，心灵就越会恳切地寻求欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，得到的回应也越是稳定。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的，危机会促使整个系统朝着增长、细化的方向发展。越是难以忍受的考验，心灵就越会恳切地寻求欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，得到的回应也越是稳定。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Eine Krise motiviert ein System zu Wachstum und Erweiterung. Je unerträglicher die Prüfung, desto offener wird der Geist für die Weisheit des Omnissiah, und desto stabiler wird die Reaktion." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Eine Krise motiviert ein System zu Wachstum und Erweiterung. Je unerträglicher die Prüfung, desto offener wird der Geist für die Weisheit des Omnissiah, und desto stabiler wird die Reaktion." {n}Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Un système en crise est d'autant plus enclin à la croissance et à la réflexion. Plus l'épreuve est difficile, plus l'appel de l'esprit à la sagesse de l'Omnimessie est fort, et plus stable est la réponse. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Un système en crise est d'autant plus enclin à la croissance et à la réflexion. Plus l'épreuve est difficile, plus l'appel de l'esprit à la sagesse de l'Omnimessie est fort, et plus stable est la réponse. » {n}La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. En situaciones de crisis, todo sistema se ve motivado a crecer y desarrollarse. Cuanto más insoportable sea la prueba, más dispuesta estará la mente a la sabiduría del Omnissiah y más estable será su respuesta». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es cierta. En situaciones de crisis, todo sistema se ve motivado a crecer y desarrollarse. Cuanto más insoportable sea la prueba, más dispuesta estará la mente a la sabiduría del Omnissiah y más estable será su respuesta». {n}El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Bir kriz, sistemi motive ederek büyüme ve özen sağlar. Sınav ne kadar katlanılamaz olursa zihnin Hermesih'in bilgeliğine yönelmesi bir o kadar samimi, aldığı yanıt da bir o kadar stabil olur." {n}Pasqal'ın voksundaki gürleyen derinlik yok olup yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. A crisis motivates a system toward growth and elaboration. The more unbearable the test, the more earnest will be the mind's appeal to the Omnissiah's wisdom, and the more stable the response." {n}The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Bir kriz, sistemi motive ederek büyüme ve özen sağlar. Sınav ne kadar katlanılamaz olursa, zihnin Hermesih'in bilgeliğine yönelmesi o kadar samimi olur ve aldığı yanıt da daha stabil olur." {n}O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
